Package grins

Interface Summary
SMILController The interface for controlling playback of SMIL documents.
SMILDocument The interface for managing SMIL documents.
SMILListener The interface through which we receive playback notifications.
SMILRenderer The interface to associate a SMILCanavas with SMIL 2 top level window.
 

Class Summary
GRiNSToolkit The entry point to the GRiNS package.
SMILCanvas Represents a top level window in SMIL 2.
 

Exception Summary
GRiNSException The exception thrown by GRiNS not native methods.
GRiNSNativeInterfaceException The exception is thrown by most GRiNS native mathods.
